title: of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 

2022 (Change of Name of Board) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited personal injury resolution board act 2022 (change name board) order 2023

title: of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and the
heading: 2. The Personal Injuries Assessment Board shall, on and from the 14th day
text_raw:
2. The Personal Injuries Assessment Board shall, on and from the 14th day 
of December 2023, be known, in the Irish language, as An Bord um Réiteach 
Díobhálacha Pearsanta and, in the English language, as the Personal Injuries 
Resolution Board. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 12 December 2023 

DARA CALLEARY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [627] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
